sub_title: Passionate about CPM/IBP and happy to introduce you to our Integrated Business Planning solution. If you want to know more please reach out
summary:
I am a Passionate hands-on Entrepreneur, who is pragmatic, Self-confident, with very strong communication skills resulting in Convincing power. Expert in Corporate Performance Management, BI and Big Data with knowledge of different supporting cloud platforms as well as business processes. Able to understand these complex business processes and translating these into understandable language. This unique ability and expertise make me the perfect colleague to bring added value to the sales teams providing the ability to qualify, understand and challenge pipeline opportunities internally, resulting in quality opportunities instead of quantity. Easily able to spot value and present this to clients and prospects, not scared to fall and learn. Using these lessons learned has made me the professional who I am today.
Passionate about sports and more specific Top Basketball. I use my sense of empathy, experience, and expertise to coach and develop talents into execution mode (also using big data analytics), Using a strategic plan to develop talents and breaking this down into smaller pieces resulting in to operational plans. This is also my foundation to find joy, passion, and expertise in supporting: Sales cycles, presenting passionately at seminars, or providing platform demos to prospect.
I believe passion is the main motivator to be successful!

Expertise:
Management and Leadership - Entrepreneur - Team Building and Development - Skills Development - Motivator- Business Consulting - Solution Architecture - Digital Transformation - Enterprise Software Technology - Innovation - Value Management - Social Business - Mobility Strategies -  Cloud - Service Oriented Architecture - Enterprise Application Integration - Training and Education - Excellent speaker and presenter

profile_positions.description:
Anaplan is revolutionizing business analytics with performance management applications that change the way enterprises plan, analyze, and improve their business. With applications delivered on the Anaplan Performance Cloud™ customers translate business complexity into intuitive models that enable people to collaborate and act in real-time.

Anaplan is a unique platform that delivers Immediate, Powerful and Connected cloud based Planning, Forecasting, Modeling, Operations Management and Performance Management. Owned and maintained by the business user and supported by a community of Anaplanners globally.

In my role as Pre-Sales Benelux, I’m responsible for carrying out Anaplan's vision and delivering its core values of innovation, simplicity, honesty, and speed within the Benelux territory, sharing the focus on driving Anaplan towards continued success, growth, and development.
profile_positions.title: Connected Planning evangelist

profile_positions.description:

profile_positions.title: Manager Solution Consultancy - Central Europe & Domain Principal EMEA - FPM

profile_positions.description:
CCH Tagetik understands the complex challenges that face the Office of Finance and translates that knowledge into intuitive, enterprise-scale performance management software solutions that drive business results. 

With CCH Tagetik, companies get the simplicity of the Cloud and the power to unify financial and operational planning; shorten the consolidation and close process; immediately analyze results, model and compare full financial statement impact of business scenarios; adjust strategic plans; seamlessly update rolling forecasts; produce formatted and auditable financial statements and management reports; collaborate on business reviews, and automate disclosure and board reporting. 

Tagetik has built-in financial intelligence so that CFO’s, finance managers, and operations executives can orchestrate multiple or all processes in one software solution. More than 750 customers across 35 countries count on Tagetik to improve efficiency, reduce risk, save money and deliver results. 

For more information, visit www.tagetik.com/benelux

We get Finance. You get results.
profile_positions.title: Consulting Services Lead BeLux

profile_positions.description:
- Playing a key rol in expanding the Accenture Strategy Finanance & Operations group, with main focus on Enterprise Performance Management.
- Preaching Oracle cloud adoption
- Align with the different Industry groups at Accenture creating awareness and elaborate on the added value of Accenture Strategy Finance and Enterprise Performance Management.
- Responsible for External and Internal marketing
- Building a Strategic vision for F&EP for the next three years
- Repsonsible for the Alliance between Accenture Strategy and Solution Providers
profile_positions.title: Senior Manager Digital Finance Technologies (Enterprise Preformance Management)

profile_positions.description:
In this role I was responsible for the set-up of the BNL entity, over the past 14 months we have grown this business from 0 revenue to >1 M revenue with +- 25% net margin. My role exists in the set-up as well as managing all parts of a starting consulting company.

¥	Finance department

¥	HR

¥	Sales

¥	Pre-Sales

¥	Business Development

¥	Partner Channel Management

¥	CFO networking

¥	Marketing
profile_positions.title: Director PureApps BeNeLux

profile_positions.description:
Working together with Marketing, Sales, PreSales, Business Partners and clients to build the Oracle EPM footprint in the BeNeLux Market.
As business development Manager at Oracle my main duty was to support Sales initiative, create and build strategic vision for the Oracle EPM and GRC suite. During this period I helped increasing EPM/GRC sales for Oracle BNL with 15%. Close working relation with BIG 4 partners to identify go to market opportunities.
Oracle integrated business planning positioning and propositioning. (Dementra and Hyperion Planning better together)

During this period I also had to manage the virtual team in Dublin, Oracle Direct for EPM.
profile_positions.title: Business Development Manager (Applications-EPM)  Benelux

profile_positions.description:
Supporting sales cycles for the Oracle EPM named account Managers as wel a preaching the Oracle vision and positioning the Red Stack. Some of my responsibilities during this role are listed as followed:
¥	Presenting EPM suite and solutions at Oracle and Partner Events. (OBUG, BNL Finance Day, Round Table discussions ….)
¥	Qualifying lead generation
¥	Creating Value propositions for Sales and Marketing with respect to Oracle EPM
¥	Underlining process pain-points and bottle necks at Global companies and providing suggested process using Oracle EPM and explaining the ROI and TCO

Managing team of 10 Oracle Direct Sales
profile_positions.title: Principle Solutions Consultant

profile_positions.description:
During my period at Accenture I was responsible for building the Oracle EPM practice and create a virtual European team which could bring Oracle EPM implementations to a success full story. During the projects my role was mainly described as Senior Project Manager/Subject Matter Expert, taking the responsibility of the full P&L, acting as trusted partner for the customer and leading the implementation teams, which different from 2 > 9 people.

Some of the clients I worked and my main responsibilities are listed below:

¥	Kofax: Senior Project Project Manager/SME, leading team of 4 people (Germany)
¥	Pfizer: SME troubleshooting and providing recommendations for improvements of the Oracle Planning application (US, NY)
¥	Heineken: SME EPM during software selection process. Consulting the customer on the best possible solution with respect to financial Consolidation (NL)
¥	Alcan: Senior Project Manager/SME, leading a team of 6 people during the implementation of Oracle Financial Management. (FR, Paris)
profile_positions.title: Manager EPM practice

profile_positions.description:
During my period at QNH I was lead consulting for all Hyperion Planning implementations. Also during this period I had to responsibility for creating the Oracle HFM and Oracle Planning partner training courses. These courses where used all over Europe (Sweden, Russia, Turkey, Poland …).

Some of my clients which I worked for at QNH are listed below:
¥	Ceva Logistics (NL)
¥	Oracle Partner Academy (Europe)
¥	APM Terminals (Global, US, Afrika, Europe)
profile_positions.title: Lead EPM Consultant
